title: Karlie Kloss means business in menswear-inspired blazer as she takes a stroll through NYC
text:
Karlie Kloss added some structure to her silhouette on Wednesday as she made the Big Apple streets her personal catwalk in a black slip dress and brown plaid blazer.

The supermodel accessorized with a brown Louis Vuitton over the shoulder bag.

Kloss, 27, also accented her outfit with some gold and silver pendant necklaces that were layered over each other.

Chic: Karlie Kloss added some structure to her silhouette on Wednesday as she made the Big Apple streets her personal catwalk in a black slip dress and brown plaid blazer

Her feet navigated the pavement in a pair of backless shoes with a kitten heel.

The sighting comes as Kloss shared a photo of herself on Tuesday in which she was practically unrecognizable in full doll costume makeup.

Kloss and makeup artist Bob Scott gave a tutorial on how to achieve the same look in a new YouTube video posted on Tuesday as well.

Strut: The supermodel accessorized with a brown Louis Vuitton over the shoulder bag

'I'm leaving the crayon costume of '99 behind and introducing you to my alter ego,' Kloss said in the caption of the YouTube video.

'If you are looking for a last minute Halloween costume idea, look no further! Thank you Bob Scott for making me think outside the (toy)box.'

The Last Minute Halloween Doll Tutorial video shows Kloss and Scott directing viewers step-by-step through the creative process.

On-duty: The Last Minute Halloween Doll Tutorial video shows Kloss and Scott directing viewers step-by-step through the creative process

'Back in action with the one and only Bob Scott,' Kloss said in the YouTube video.

'I'm so excited that you guys get to see into this transformation process.'

Scott prepped Kloss' face then took Elmer's glue stick to 'block out' her eyebrows.

Wow! Scott prepped Kloss' face then took Elmer's glue stick to 'block out' her eyebrows

'So the purpose of this is that you really just wanna slick down the brows, right?' Kloss asked.

'Yes, with the grain and then against the grain and then back with the grain,' Scott replied.

He then let the brows set and used setting powder on her eyebrows, finishing things off with foundation.
description: Karlie Kloss added some structure to her silhouette on Wednesday as she made the Big Apple streets her personal catwalk in a black slip dress and brown plaid blazer.
